Sentencas: The maritime industry is facing a technological challenge regarding the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions as a way of achieving carbon neutrality by 2050.
Titulo: Knowledge gaps in fuel cell-based maritime hybrid power plants and alternative fuels

Sentencas: This research focuses on the use of alternative fuels and fuel cell technologies, combined in hybrid power plants with well-known technologies, such as internal combustion engines and gas turbines, to achieve high flexibility.
Titulo: Knowledge gaps in fuel cell-based maritime hybrid power plants and alternative fuels

Sentencas: In this work, hybridized proton exchange membrane fuel cells and solid oxide fuel cells are under investigation, together with hydrogen, methanol and ammonia fuels.
Titulo: Knowledge gaps in fuel cell-based maritime hybrid power plants and alternative fuels

Sentencas: Literature on fuel cell-based maritime hybrid power plants is analyzed and discussed to identify knowledge areas not fully covered yet and to open a debate on the topic from the perspective of maritime engineering A combination of proton exchange with solid oxide fuel cells and an evaluation of cargo space loss, as opposed to fuel storage, are identified as knowledge gaps among others.
Titulo: Knowledge gaps in fuel cell-based maritime hybrid power plants and alternative fuels
